method.name: Decision making by Emerging Patterns Classifier

reference.ref: J. Li , G. Dong , K. Ramamohanarao, L. Wong DeEPs: A New Instance-Based Lazy Discovery and Classification System. Machine Learning 54 (2004) 99-124.

generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of emerging patterns (somewhat similar to subgroup discovery).
generalDescription.howWork: This pattern based classifier tries to discover patterns derived from eac test instance in the training set. The final output is computed by obtaining those patterns to get what is its more probable class

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: Clas-Deeps Dataset: iris (10 fold cross validation run) Training set: iris-10-1tra.dat to iris-10-10tra.dat Test set: iris-10-1tst.dat to iris-10-10tst.dat Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: default values
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the results/Vis-Clas-Check/TSTClas-Deeps folder the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.06 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.06289320754704404 Correctly classified: 0.94 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Summary of data, Classifiers: iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9407407407407408 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.04296296296296297 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.0064576280645046715 Correctly classified: 0.957037037037037 Global N/C: 0.0
